name: Eg.Nima
description:
Eg.Nima was made during Rouflabarbajam V in 2015.

----------

Henri : Design, levels, code

Garance : Art

----------

So apparently this game was about helping a bird person find a bearded ghost on top of a mountain. I don't remember what I had in mind when I made that.

It's a funny little puzzle-platformer with 3 parallel universes, that each change the appearance of the level design, as well as your powers.

The game can be played with a controller or a keyboard.

----------

Each dimension has a color. When you're in a dimension, the spikes and the enemies of that color are disabled, but the platforms too. You also get a special power in each dimension.

Red dimension : Double jump

Yellow dimension : Glider

Blue dimension : Shield

----------

CONTROLLER

LEFT STICK = Move

A = Jump (Double jump)

Y = Switch to yellow dimension

X = Switch to blue dimension

B = Switch to red dimension

LT/RT = Activate power (Glider/Shield)

MENU = Skip to next level

VIEW = Back to previous level

----------

KEYBOARD

ZQSD = Move/jump (Double jump)

A/E = Switch to previous / next dimension

SPACE = Activate power (Glider/Shield)

PLUS = Skip to next level

MINUS = Back to previous level
